job.title: Volunteer Market Researcher
job.description: We are a web-based nonprofit service organization that pairs online advice seekers in their teens, 20's and 30's with a nationwide network of Cyber-Grandparents, aged 60 to 105, who share their hard-earned knowledge and wisdom. Our Elder members participate individually from their home computers or in groups at retirement communities (with the help of a facilitator). Anyone with access to the Internet can request anonymous advice on any topic and will receive a personalized e-mail response in return. The voice of experience is hip, sincere, and highly sought after by people of all ages; we are the most popular source of free online advice in the country. The Elder Wisdom Circle has been featured on ABC, CBS, BBC, NPR and in many publications including USA Today and Time.Volunteer Market Researcher Elder Wisdom Circle, a nonprofit organization, is seeking a talented Market Research Analyst to survey client preferences and statistical data about our clients. Reporting to the Executive Director, the successful candidate will be able to design and analyze autonomously qualitative data, trends, strategies, and competition aiming at increasing competitiveness.About UsThis opportunity is virtual -- work from your home or office.The Elder Wisdom Circle is an award-winning online inter-generational program. Empathetic grandparent figures offer advice to younger generations on managing lifeâs challenges including self-improvement, career, family, dating relationships, and many other topics. The EWC has been featured in over 100 media outlets including ABC, BBC, NPR, the NY Times, and many others. To date, we have facilitated almost 500,000 one-on-one interactions and our website receives 400,000 visits each year. We turned 20-years-old this year and are working on a strategic plan to determine our future. This includes understanding how best to serve our clients' needs. During COVID-19, visits to our website more than doubled.Job BriefWe are looking for a methodical Market Research Analyst to survey client preferences and statistical data in order to support our clients by understanding their decision-making process regarding where they are and how they are seeking virtual advice, in order to inform strategic planning purposes. We assume you may spend about 10-12 hours a month.ResponsibilitiesCollect data on clients, competitors, and the marketplace and consolidate information into actionable items, reports, and presentations that we can use for planning.Understand objectives and design surveys to discover prospective clientsâ preferencesCompile and analyze statistical dataPerform a valid and reliable market research SWOT analysisInterpret data, formulate reports and make recommendationsUse online market research and catalog findings to databasesProvide competitive analysis on various nonprofit advice-giving-organization offerings, identify trends, pricing/business models, and methods of operationRequirementsProven Market Research Analysis experienceAbility to interpret large amounts of data and to multi-taskStrong communication and presentation skillsSearch engines, web analytics, and business research tools acumenWorking knowledge of data modelingAdequate knowledge of data collection methods (polls, focus groups, surveys etc.)Please note we will only consider applicants who submit their resumes and a note about why they are interested in this opportunity.Thanks for your interest in volunteering for EWC. We love our mission and think you will, too.This is a volunteer opportunity provided by VolunteerMatch, in partnership with LinkedIn for Good.
